attributes.action: Pull Great Britan out of the eurovision song contest and stop the funding of it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eurovision song contest is no longer a song contest and even when Great Britan enter a reasonable entry it gets lost in the politics of the voting. Why enter this contest and help fund it. We should pull out now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
